title: Understanding the IF Function
text: The IF function is used to perform a logical test and return one value for a TRUE result, and another for a FALSE result.

title: Components of the IF Function
text: The IF function typically has three components: the logical test, the value if true, and the value if false.

hintAnswer: it determines the value for a cell based on a logical test
title: Logical Test in IF Function
text: What is the purpose of the logical test in the IF function?
choices: it determines the value for a cell based on a logical test
it determines the value for a cell based on a data test
it ensures that all possibilities are covered
